Name: Heavy Rescue: 401
Title: Thread the Needle
Desc: A tractor becomes wedged between an overpass and a guardrail; a semi stalls in a dangerous spot.
LongDescription: A tractor wedged between an overpass and a guardrail forces the Ross crew into a game of inches; Herb's crew goes deep into the woods to rescue a tree-bound truck; Sonny tries to clear a stalled semi in a dangerous spot.
